title: PC February 18 - Taoufik Haidar, Luigi Coclite, Mohamed El Ferhane, Muhamed Toukabri ... assassinated in the Esselunga construction site
content:
Exploitation, low and late wages, perhaps 2 of the workers even without contract and insurance. Apart from Luigi Coclite, they were all immigrants - immigrants who are good in Italy when they can be exploited, paid little; immigrant workers who do not die on the trip to Italy, die at work.
Damn masters, cursed government!

Taoufik Haidar, 43, from Morocco, Mohamed Toukabri, 54 -year -old Tunisian, Mohamed El Farhane, 24, from Morocco, Luigi Coclite, 59 years old, originally from Teramo and residing in Collesalvetti. Still missing is Bouzekri Rahimi del Morocco, 56 years old.

The three wounded are originally from Romania.

This is Sansra: Luigi Chocolate, Mohamed El Farhan, Tawfiq Haider

Haidar had been in Italy for at least 15 years, for eight years he had taken a house in Palazzolo, he had recently moved to the Bergamo area, in Chiuduno and until last November 2023 he was enrolled in the CGL Fillea in Bergamo. El Farhane also appears to have lived in Palazzolo for a couple of years, and it seems to have moved to Bergamo recently. Ditto the other workers. "They worked for a construction company in Chiari left in the team every Monday morning to go away to work and went home on Friday evening".

"My uncle - says a nephew of Haidar - was a good person, he worked hard to send his money necessary to live to his wife and two children in Morocco"; he complained that the employer was in

delay with payments.

Mohamed El Farhane, Moroccan 24 years old, and his compatriot Taoufik Haidar, 43 years old, the irregular workers Italy. They without prejudice to a valid residence permit and the contract. Mohamed El Farhane would have submitted an international protective application that would have been refused to him,

Luigi Coclite was specialized in work with concrete and in the management of the Betoniere, he worked on his own. He leaves two children, Lucrezia and Alessio, respectively 18 and 22 years old, who live in Vicarello with his mother Simona. He is described by those who know him as a strong and kind person.

«We die of work with hunger salaries - Paolo Fantppié, secretary general Uil Toscana - is also of the notice -. By now the companies that win the contracts do nothing but organize the work, at most they carry out 5 percent, otherwise subcontract to a network of companies. Subcontracting is equivalent to exploitation, and is often the common denominator of the massacres at work ».

The client company and the contractor of the collapse in the Esselunga construction site in Florence are the same as the accidents that occurred in the construction site of another supermarket of the Lombard Group of the GDO in Genoa, in the San Benigno area that took place on February 10, 2023 in which three workers were Wounded due to the failure of a parking ramp for the use of the new Esselunga: La Villata spa, the real estate 100% participated by Esselunga, and AEP, building activities Pavesi, based in Pieve del Cairo (Pavia).
